comments.body: Why are these commented out?  If there are broken reasons why they can't be added, maybe leave them commented out but add a TODO comment saying why.

I've tried enabling them, but had a problem with `int32`.
The tests were crashing without an error message for me :/
So I wasn't quite sure what to put in the TODO comment.
Should I add a comment saying `// TODO Find out why int32 doesn't work` ?
